title: Hillary Clinton to stop in Colorado in November
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Hillary Clinton to stop in Colorado in November Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton will make a stop in Colorado Nov. 24 to campaign in the Denver area. Post to Facebook Hillary Clinton to stop in Colorado in November Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton will make a stop in Colorado Nov. 24 to campaign in the Denver area.  //on9news.tv/1S0OwGj   Join the Conversation To   Hillary Clinton to stop in Colorado in November Mallory E Davis, KUSA 9:34 a.m. MDT October 23, 2015 Hillary Clinton, former U.S. secretary of state and democratic candidate for U.S President. (Photo: DANIEL ACKER/BLOOMBERG) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
DENVER - Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton will make a stop in Colorado Nov. 24 to campaign in the Denver area. 
According to her campaign, the stop is part of an effort to build support and a grassroots organization outside the four early states. 
During the stop, Clinton will discuss why she's running and "who she'll fight for" as president. 
Further details of the stop will be released soon.
